subject: ✍️ What to Know About The First NASDAQ-Listed HYPE Treasury Company
body:
Saylor did it for BTC.

Lubin did it for ETH.

Now Hyperion (fka Eyenovia) is doing it for HYPE!

On a new episode of _Yield Talks_ on [The Edge Podcast](http://linktr.ee/edge_pod), we record the first public interview with a NASDAQ-listed company going all-in on Hyperliquid. The company Eyenovia has rebranded to [Hyperion DeFi](https://hyperiondefi.com/) and plans to allocate $50M into HYPE, the native token of Hyperliquid, becoming the first public company to adopt HYPE as a crypto treasury reserve asset. We speak with the Hyperion CIO and Board Member Hyunsu Jung about why they chose HYPE, how they plan to operate as a Hyperliquid validator, and what this means for broader investor interest in HYPE.
